div.div:
Padraig - July 2, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.7 full
Great
Sound is a little bit crackly but fine really, might be a setting. Works work my Nokia CK 600 Bluetooth Carkit

FilGov - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.7 full
Poor
Doesn't save any call longer than a couple of minutes = useless.

kin - June 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.2.7 full
Galaxy S 3
Works great on US GS III

Eruan - June 27, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.7 full
Useful app
A very useful app and so far has never fail me. The wav file format is good for high quality recording.

Ted - July 3, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2.7 full
Works as expected

mainmast2 - June 27, 2012 - Version 1.2.7 full
Always works

Berto - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.7 full
Galaxy Nexus Jelly Bean 4.1
Fantastic app until Jelly Bean, it worked flawlessly in ICS. Now in Jelly Bean it doesn't record anything. Five stars again when it works in JB.

Matt - June 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.6 full
Works superb on my rooted GS2.
I have tried every other call recording app out there, and none of them worked. I am pleased to say that this app work like a treat on my Galaxy S2. Well done!

Ioan - June 29, 2012 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.2.6 full
Simply, the best!
This is the best phone recorder on the Market. Highly recommended!

Dhanushka - June 27, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.2.6 full
Work perfectly
Works perfectly on rooted one x . @ Helo Wei, Better to check the settings again as its working perfectly in my one x . I think there was a thread on xda how to to get it to work .

Hunter - June 24, 2012 - Version 1.2.6 full
HTC vivid
Works flawless on my rooted HTC vivid

Victor - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.6 full
Works well with Google nexus
Android 4.04, don't forget to root. Worth the effort. ,

haris - June 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.2.5 full
!!!!
Samsung galaxy note n 7000 now working...but BT NO I wish it stay unless like this

Sac - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.5 full
Works perfectly on my galaxy nexus..
Needed some work around to install with the alsa and all... but once installed, works like a charm !

Salam - June 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.5 full
Salam - Samsung Galaxy 2
Works like charm: Stock ICS 4.0.3 ROOTED rom (I9100XXLPS), Kernel: 3.0.33-Syiah, updated libs from the developer standard API (vUplink+ vDwnlink).

shlomil - June 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.5 full
Works gr8 on my gnex
Good sound quality. Installation process was a little annoying because it asked for alsa and alsa asked for busybox and I had to try few busybox installers until alsa worked. But still worth the money and 5 stars.

Gerardo - June 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.5 full
Working once again
Best recorder ever, had a problem because of software upgrade on phone, uninstall and reinstalled choose phone model , works great

Johny007 - June 24, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.5 full
Perfektní
Na HTC Sensation a Virtuous Inkvizition ROM funguje perfektne.

Leviticus - June 5, 2012 - Version 1.2.5 full
No go for EVO 4g LTE
Doesn't work, never had this problem before.

Clarence - June 18, 2012 - Version 1.2.5 full
Works on T989 ICS
Well programmed. Good graphical interface. Good selection of audio formats. Records both callers in a clear manner. Very pleased with the purchase. Especially because it works with the ICS upgrade on my Samsung Galaxy S2 T989.

Por LCC - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.5 full
SGS2 ICS4.03 is not work
SGS2 ICS4.03 is work now.

vijay kumar - June 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.2.5 full
Sulerb
It is superb . Works great on lg soul. Not work in motorola razar .

Ali - June 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.5 full
Finally
A reliable call recorder on the galaxy nexus

Arvind - June 24, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.2.5 full
Excellent
Great aap. A must have.

Tarek - June 16, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.2.5 full
Works good
After installing a zip patch from recovery on a rooted device. A bit pricy but you get what you pay for!

Adam - June 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.5 full
Working great.
Good solution for call recording. Keep up the good work!

Alexander - June 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.4 full
Please!
If the app is not working please contact with the developer if you want to get it work. Your message here won't help to fix your issue.

Scott - June 3, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.4 full
Works flawlessly on HTC Sensation - Ordroid
I have used this app for months on several different roms and always works as advertised. Current ROM is Ordroid with sense 4 on HTC Sensation

Abe - June 3, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.2.4 full
Won't open
Won't open on samsung infuse 4g, froyo Can't get refund even within 15 min bc tried installing twice.

ka81 - June 4, 2012 - Version 1.2.4 full
SGSII GT-I9100 ICS 4.0.3 LP7 official with Root
SGSII GT-I9100 ICS 4.0.3 LP7 official with Root WORKING!!! best software for callrecording!!!

Andrey - June 3, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.2.4 full
Proga - super!

Patrick - May 18, 2012 - Version 1.2.2 full
Infuse 4G not working
Craig, can you tell me what settings you used to get this to work please? Can anyone? thanks

Frankbonatelli - May 17, 2012 - Version 1.2.2 full
With out question its worth the pennies!!
I used the beta on my HTC Desire HD and fell in love with this app. Never forget a single conversation on the phone again. I Now own a Galaxy Nexus and discovered a pro version!! Its on my top five must have first installed apps.

Stynkfysh - May 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.2 full
Works Perfectly
I am happy to report that this app works perfectly without any configuration other than the installation of a secondary application on my Galaxy Nexus. One of my new must have apps.

Scott - May 24, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2.2 full
Love it!
Thanks for this awesome app... Been wanting something to do this for awhile, and the level of polish is commendable. Thanks again!

MicroplexNews.com - May 17, 2012 - Version 1.2.2 full
Desire Yes... Vivid Not so far
Worked like a charm and I loved it on my HTC Desire. Just got HTC Vivid and haven't been able to get it to work on this phone yet.

Paul - May 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.2 full
Perfect
Works out of the box on my Gnex. Just installed ALSA, then this and calls are recording without any further config. Excellent solution, and very grateful to Skvalex. Well worth the price. Thank you.

Craig - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.2.2 full
Samsung Infuse 4G
Took a little bit of time testing out various settings but all seems to be working on my Samsung Infuse 4G running custom GB ROM

Alex Savin - May 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.2 full
YES!
It really works! On Galaxy Nexus!

Ryan S - May 31, 2012 - Version 1.2.2 full
Motorola Droid Bionic
Works great I'm on Eclipse Rom 2.2 using the AlsaMixer here and the CallRecorder. It records both sides great after a reboot. I am very happy I have been looking everywhere to record on the Bionic nothing worked but this.

Ansh - May 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.2.2 full
Waste of Money .
I dnt wanna give ne star in My galaxy Note 4.0.3 Version ICS it does not wrk My Money Is Wasted dnt pay if ur using ICS. .

Thorsten - June 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.2 full
Galaxy Nexus
Literally the only voice recorder that works on the Nexus - and its has great quality and interface. Great!

vitalik.t - May 15, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.2 full
The best call recording application

ZachM1 - June 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.2 full
Only one that works

Hitesh Panelia - June 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.2.2 full
Superb software
Devloper are rocking thanks.

Matthew - May 2, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.2.1 full
So close!
He almost has it fully compatible with the Motorola RAZR... I can't wait :-D

THIS IS MY OLD ACCOUNT! PLEASE ADD THE NEW ONE! - May 5, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2.1 full
Perfect
Just what I needed! No more, "But you said..."

Skitzo - May 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.1 full
Works perfect on Galaxy Nexus!
Install this app, download ASLA and open it. Install the ASLA package. REBOOT your phone. Enjoy. THANKS!

Psy - May 2, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2.1 full
Causes evo 3d to reboot when using alsa option
Alsa is causing evo 3d to freeze and reboot when using to record calls. Using kernel patch 2nd party is very quite and hard to hear in recordings.

James - May 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2 full
Finally
Been waiting for this since I got my phone.

jrmatics - May 3, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2 full
Excellent
Love this app. Works great. The rom I'm using and kernel are awesome and have this app working perfecrly

Mindaugas - April 30, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 1.1.9 full
Finally found it
Works perfect on htc vision rooted,I mean works not using mic, it records and plays perfect quality while on bluetooth too, took long time for the android coders to figure this out. Now how about adding some more features like auto email delivery, thanks for Russian coders. Spasibo Alex

Veit - March 16, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 1.1.9 full
perfect.
using it on desire z with andromedus ICS. turned off vibrations. first few seconds are sometimes missing, i guess that's lag.

Paul - April 10, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.1.9 full
Working on HTC Sensation (ARHD 6.5.1)
FINALLY, after what seemed like endless searching & trialing 4 different apps that failed miserably, finally a call recorder that works on HTC Sensation using the int ph line (not mic/spkr) & records in WAV. You guys rock! Thanks for a competent functioning app with tonnes of options. The playback sound is loud & clear! Well worth the money! THANK YOU! :)

Murz - April 26, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
Works good on Galaxy S2 with Cyangenmod 9 ICS 4.0
Thanks, call recording works very well on Galaxy S2 with Cyangenmod 9 ROM (Android ICS 4.0.4). But for start working you must add some system files by hands or via "Call Recorder Galaxy S2 Trial" application (in this app select "Audio - Fix call recording". After this - reboot and skvalex CallRecorder will work well (Standart android api)!

andreus - April 2, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
HTC Sensation (ARHD 6.5.5)
Works really great.. immediately buy after trying lite version. THIS was that app i was looking for. Thanks a lot

Joe - March 18, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
Awesome so far
HTC rezound running stock Rom with ziggy kernel...BA in call recording

chobart - April 19, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.1.9 full
Zdecydowanie najlepszy
HTC Desire. Samo nagrywanie w domyślnej opcji "Kernel z możliwością dwustronnego nagr..." (dla zrootowanych urządzeń) do pliku .wav działa rewelacyjnie. Doskonale słychać obie strony. Początkowo miałem problem z tym, że podczas rozmowy telefon się zawieszał i trzeba było wyciągać baterię, ale odznaczyłem opcje: 1. "Pokaż powiadomienie" i w zaawansowanych 2. "Nie wyłączaj ekranu..." oraz 3. "Pokaż powiadomienie podczas..." - od tego czasu działa bez zarzutu (nie wiem, która z tych opcji powodowała problemu bo wyłączyłem jednocześnie). Plus za możliwość wyłączenia grup kontaktów. Ogólnie to czego długo szukałem - nagrywa w tle wszystko co chcę w doskonałej jakości.

Đỗ Huy - April 18, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
Awesome so far ...
Everything's perfect ... run smoothly on Samsung Galaxy S2 v2.3.6 ...

Charbel chamoun - April 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.9 full
charbel
it's a great app. but if u could add a feature that allows to sort the recordings by name or phone number. or if it could group the recordings by date.

alan - April 24, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
worked like a charm
didn't have to do anything. go into preferences to make sure you know where your files are being saved.

Jenya - April 26, 2012 - Version 1.1.9 full
SKVAlex's Call Rec works great on HTC Incredible S
Rec from a line, lots of customizations, highly recommended. Worth paying for the full version.

I have an HTC desire hd running on gingerbread . I hear my voice ...
I have an HTC desire hd running on gingerbread . I hear my voice loudly although I sound a bit nasal but can't hear the other person at all . Help !!!

Chris - April 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.9 full

3dhomemaster - March 11, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.1.8 full
HTC EVO 3D
ROM: Synergy Kernel: 2.6.35.14RCMIX-ACS-EVO3D-CR-V9 App needs to be more user friendly & instructions could DEFINITELY be more clear; however, recording works perfectly! Only took 3 days of searching & flashing dif kernels, but works nonetheless. Con't really complain about that! Great Job!

Kiembo - March 12, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.8 full
SGS2 2.3.6
Mea culpe. If you're running custom kernel make sure "android logger" is enabled. Work as advertised. Thx

Ace - March 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.8 full
Refund
Doesn't work on galaxy nexus was issued refund

James - March 2, 2012 - Version 1.1.8 full
Records everything on AT&T Note
This records from all streams including bluetooth. It just works. The dev also is very active in supporting it. Running it on an AT&T Note with DAGr8 RC2 Saurom ROM (Android 2.3.6) with the Standard Android API.

Igor - March 8, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.1.8 full
Когда появится поддержка Android ICS 4.0?
И будет ли вообще?

my-group689 - March 9, 2012 - Samsung Exhibit 2 4G with version 1.1.8 full
One of the best
Worth the money. Worked perfectly on my ROOTED Samsung Exhibit II 4G

Martins - March 5, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.1.8 full
HTC Desire
Works perfect!

Yuri - March 4, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.1.8 full
Near perfect.

Peter - March 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 1.1.8 full
Nearing perfect. Good work

maxh - March 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.1.7 full
Excellent, works on AT&T Note, and finally a decent trial!
This is the only call record program I was able to get working on the AT&T version of the Galaxy Note, and it works better than any of the others worked on my other phones! Thank you for providing a decent, usable trial period! Long enough to ensure it works. I'm now a happy customer!

Adrian - February 23, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.1.6 full
Works with GSII Skyrocket!!!
Iv been searching for months for a app that would record my calls on my Att Skyrocket I727. This has been confirmed to work on android 2.3.5 and 2.3.6 stock kernal. I had to change settings to record calls from standard android API. Call recording quality is great!! Thanks!!

MushMushon - February 27, 2012 - Version 1.1.6 full
Perfect
Samsung Galaxy s 2. Just purchased it and it is working fine. (Sharing is not working but I used USB to get the files out).

richvs - February 19, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.1.6 full
Very very good
So pleased that this works after a little effort. The ability to add a text note per recording somewhere in metadata would ice my cake.

Joshua - February 23, 2012 - Version 1.1.6 full
Awesome!
Works with my Thunderbolt with a custom kernel. Also works with stock kernel with root on HTC Rezound, this app is invaluable for dishonest customer service reps, and general information (phone numbers, web URLs, confirmations). Be smart, check your local laws before using.

Prince - February 26, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Ray with version 1.1.6 full
Not at all recording the calls
I just purchased the full version yesterday in my ST18i phone. First, I am unable to enable the root permissions. I do not know how to update the kernel for 2 way recording. I am not seeing a guide or the patch in the site for doing this. This is really like a cheating for a paid software. It is not fulfilling the purpose as mentioned in the website. Also, I am not able to play the recorded calls. Please help me to enable the root permissions.

mohan - February 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.1.6 full
Call Recorder
Working very well after initial struggle. I recommend strongly for all those who need authentic recording of calls

Great update
Was not working at first. Reflashed Rom to my EVO again all is good. Email the dev didn't go through though. Update works great, still recording perfect through cell and speaker. Great app. Rooted EVO on Classic Rom by tommytomatoe. Fantastic.

I bay this app but its not working on my samsung s I 9000 and when app runing in backgraund incoming and out going call not working.

Ray - November 20, 2011 - Version 1.0.41 alpha full
Excellent !!!!
I've been looking for something like this since my Palm Trio died a few years ago. Its working in and out on my Motorola Admiral even with Bluetooth

slabertooch - November 19, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.0.41 alpha full
Works great

wiswaud - July 28, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.0.40 alpha full
which roms need to be installed?
Running CM7 on a nexus one. App works, but other side is recorded very faintly and noisily - i'm guessing it's recording from the mic, not from the line, and i bought this specifically so i'd get the line recording. What needs to be done on a nexus one / CM7 so this app will work properly???

Ward - July 13, 2011 - Version 1.0.40 alpha full
HTC Thunderbolt works great!
Running CM7/MR2 official radio using KangBang 0.8 works flawlessly!

svenx - November 7, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.39 alpha full
Flawless
Rooted htc desire, cm7. Works flawlessly. At least i n my case it doesn't use the mic, so in/out quality is excellent. Thanks!

Ernesto - November 5, 2011 - Version 1.0.39 alpha full
Great app!
Works Flawlessly!!! Works on rooted EVO 4G on Kinged-Shooter ROM w/ Lithids Freedom kernel v0.9. Also works on Motorola Admiral out of the box!

Mix - November 13, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.39 alpha full
Great!
Works on HTC Desire. Cyanogen 7.1. One wish - need to started on device boot.

Nathan - November 16, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G Slide with version 1.0.39 alpha full
Mind changed about call recorder, I used to hate this app, now it's the ...

perfect on miui for galaxy nexus

I reluctantly purchased this app for my Sony Ericsson Xperia pro Android-based SmartPhone. The list of compatible devices has two Sony Ericsson Xperia models. So, I figured that the application would be compatible with my Xperia pro since it too uses the same Android OS as the two models listed on the application's page. Well, it does NOT. If you have a Sony Ericsson Xperia cell phone, do not buy this application as it will likely not work! The application apparently records the conversation, but then it will not let you play it back.
